website_summaries.verdict: A full-face snowmobiling helmet that will provide you with extra wind protection in addition to keeping you safe.
pros: Swiveling face shield comes down to provide extra wind and debris protection
Available in several sizes for older teenagers and adults
Can be used as a full motorcycle helmet
Comes with facial padding for extra comfort
cons: Some advertised sizes are one size too large or small

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Brains
customer_reviews.text: In all seriousness, I would probably be dead or, at the very least, unable to walk if it weren't for this helmet. 5/5. Would recommend. I also found no problems with it; no whistling, no discomfort on head, good visor, good ventilation, and it looks fresh for the ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler_Salami

customer_reviews.title: Helmet Is A Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: The comment is going to be a bit graphic but such is life when riding motorcycles. This helmet saved my life when I flew off my motorcycle and hit the the road hard. The helmet also prevented me from looking like Quasimodo when I hit a pile of rocks after I slide off the road. Before the accident I loved the helmet because of the look, comfort, and I was able to use my peripheral vision. And now, I’m totally grateful and thank God for the helmet for allowing me to keep my brain, teeth, and face intact instead of being all over the road. Buying this helmet was among the best things I’ve done.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge P

customer_reviews.title: this helmet saved my life
customer_reviews.text: you have to keep the top vents closed or it will whistle, that being said i was in a serious motorcycle crash when a car t-boned me at 35 mph and this cheap helmet saved my life, its new home it on my bookshelf in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: PGM Josh

customer_reviews.title: This helmet saved my life
customer_reviews.text: I am more than happy with my purchase. For $40, it's plenty comfortable and plenty cool. I'm going to probably buy another one in the spring, but for now I'm going with something heated. The only issue I had with this is that it does fog in 35-45 degree Fahrenheit weather. I crashed face first at 40ish mph and the only thing that happened was my nasal passage, a fragile bone, fractured. I would post pictures, but the helmet is splattered with blood from the nosebleed that came during the crash. I'm just happy to be here. My life is definitely worth more than $40, but this was well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jankowiak

customer_reviews.title: Super helmet for the value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an excellent helmet. It's comfortable and seals pretty good. It has good noise reduction and is not to heavy. The venting system doesn't seem to work to well, but hey, it's an affordable product and will still serve you well. It fits really well and is nice and snug, but not too snug. It has great looks and the visor is easy to clean and position. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for an affordable and dependable helmet while in transition for an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: KARL

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a very cheap helmet
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a very cheap helmet. Comfortable, venting not bad, well made. Don't expect all the bells and whistles. Haven't had to try it in an accident but seems solid. Nice first helmet, use as a guest rider helmet later. I got this helmet to get me through training, didn't want to spend a lot in case I didn't pass it didn't like riding. Still using it while I shop for an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: DaveBP

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome helmet, the only reason I returned it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome helmet, the only reason I returned it was to get a smaller size. I am a 5'4, 110 pound female with a head circumference of 22 1⁄2 inches and had bought a large based on other reviews. The large was too loose, when I turned my head the helmet would bobble around and move to obscure my vision so I exchanged for the medium which was perfectly snug and stable. Visor flips open easily, helmet itself is very safe and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Isabella White

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Overall not impressed with this helmet. Not confident that it would hold up under regular use. Might be great for the occasional/recreational rider, but not for the commuter/daily rider. Recommend spending the extra and getting a quality helmet your life might depend on it. Pros The wind noise isn't terrible. Air flow is ok. Visibility is good. Cons The liner slides around. The chinstraps connect in the opening for your ears which is annoying. The cheek pads sit back too far.
customer_reviews.author: B. Afraid

customer_reviews.title: Would save up for a 100+ dollar helmet in the future
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing a review on fuel helmet SH-FF0016. Pros: cheap price for a motorcycle helmet. Sleek design. Double ring for chin. Lightweight. Cons: top air vents are cheap & fall off easily. Fogs up fast (recommend lifting the face shield an inch). A lot of noise riding 65mph & up. Would definitely recommend saving up for a $100 -$199 helmet. Overall thought, buy this helmet for a backup or if you need something temporarily ..such as passing your motorcycle riding test.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it looks and feels nice and it's one of the cheapest motorcycle helmets I ...
customer_reviews.text: An okay helmet for the price, it feels a tad tight even though I've always worn a medium sized helmet. The ear cushions inside keep it from rolling and make the helmet secure, but it makes wearing any kind of headset or earbuds impossible, as it pushes them deeper into your ear or pulls them out when you slide the helmet on. The vents don't seem to do anything at all and the visor fogs up in anything under 60 degree weather. All that said, it looks and feels nice and it's one of the cheapest motorcycle helmets I can find.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Starter Helmet!
customer_reviews.text: 2 and a half Year Review: I bought this helmet when I got back on a motorcycle in April of 2018. I ride just about every day, and this helmet has been on my head with every single ride. If you are just starting out, or just don't have a ton of cash (like me), this helmet is amazing for the price. It's a little loud on the wind noise front, and doesn't ventilate QUITE as much as I would like. But what can you expect for a helmet under $100? Buy it and be surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Lael Clark

customer_reviews.title: I'm still alive!
customer_reviews.text: Crashed my scooter this morning on my way to work and luckily was wearing this helmet! I slid the bike and the side of my head hit the pavement. I was buzzed for a few seconds, but it didn't hurt and I now feel fine. The helmet stayed intact, but is a bit scratched up. I would say this helmet saved my life and I'm thankful for that. It was also a great price..maybe like $45.
customer_reviews.author: Patrici Murici

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive helmet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as my second helmet for passengers. I personally wouldn't use this as my primary helmet\. The windscreen fogs up in the cold, it doesn't have a wind guard by the chin, and a couple other things. But for a occasional use, for passenger, or for putting around town on a scooter, this product is just fine. And of course, I'd take this over not wearing any helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Chuckansas

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fell apart after 1 year of use. I kept it clean and handled it well. The interior will break loose and start sliding around; The lining just falls off. For $50 I guess a year of safety is alright. On the safe note, this thing feels good to protect you on a 250-300cc scooter/bike, nothing more. Replaced with a quality Bell. You get what you pay for in the Moto world.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very decent considering it's about the cheapest full face helmet out there. 10/10 would buy again. Nice starter helmet that probably becomes your 2nd passenger helmet when you ultimately upgrade to something better.
customer_reviews.author: Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: The helmet is pretty comfortable. It has vents in it so the ...
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is pretty comfortable. It has vents in it so the air can come through. Only problem I've seen is that if going at low speeds or stopped and the visor is all the way closed then it fogs up, but its fine if the visor is cracked open a little bit. Luckily I can't say that this helmet saved my life, and hopefully I never have to find out.
customer_reviews.author: CJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: For the money...
customer_reviews.text: Its a great helmet. The clear visor scratches and accumulates grime easily though so I don't use it when I don't have to. There's good ventilation and I haven't had my visor fog up yet when closed. I would recommend replacing the visor if you're picky butt otherwise its awesome. I slid my bike and rolled on the street and this helmet didn't take anything but a single scratch. I don't know if that's the helmet or how I handled my body while being pitched across the street but awesome nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: Awkward Sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought an L a week ago but it was too tight. I wore a Large while doing my motorcycle safety classes. So I sent it back and got an XL. It feels good and looks great. The glossy paint isn't nearly as bad as I initially thought, and it doesn't pick up finger prints as well as other glossy objects.
customer_reviews.author: legopieface

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality, but great for the price! I bought it as a second helmet for passengers I may take with me on my scooter from time to time and no one has ever complained. The visor did get unscrewed after a couple of months but it was a relatively easy fix!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trinidad shopper review
customer_reviews.text: I am from trinidad and tobago( Jacob Walcott) on youtube. I paid 44 us for it and $200 ttd to collect it which is roughly 30 us, It fits true to size , super strong , air vents work , u can see the glue marks inside , that's the only thing I don't like. it's a fuel helmet an it can fit a glasses or safety shades inside it is also dot approved
customer_reviews.author: jSimple Cell, Inc

customer_reviews.title: I think its a great deal on a good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought an extra large for a 60cm head circumference and it fits well. a little loud with the visor down, but never found a helmet that wasn't. I think its a great deal on a good product. would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Treece

customer_reviews.title: This helmet fits under the seat of my 2015 Honda ...
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits under the seat of my 2015 Honda PCX 150, a lot of large helmets won't fit. The chin strap is really long, much longer than it needs to be. I guess this would be helpful if you didn't want to take the strap all the way out when taking the helmet off.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Nollan

customer_reviews.title: is comfortable to wear for an hour straight
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because this is my first helmet and I haven't crashed with it yet to find out how well it holds up. I need it for lapping day at a local track and it only had to be DOT certified with no other specifications. This fit as expected, is comfortable to wear for an hour straight, and with the shield up or off breathes just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: i like the helmet fits good, comfortable and vents work ok. the bad part was when i droped it from less than 3ft one of the vents cracked. the helmet came vary fast in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Bigman

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I'd say for the price this helmet is great. Will it survive a fall sure. Will it hurt maybe. But you'll survive that's all that matters. I use it for the females I give rides to on occasions. They like it. If it's your everyday invest more on a safer helmet. It's your life don't go cheap
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works. Flipped my race mower 5 minutes after putting this helmet on. Its a little scuffed up but my face is good!
customer_reviews.author: Fisher Auto

customer_reviews.title: It's fine for around town when speeds are below 45
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. You get what you pay for. It's fine for around town when speeds are below 45. Of you close the visor all the way and go above 45, it vibrates. I open it 1 notch. It does have a bunch of wind noise when above 45. I'm going to get another brand and yse this as an extra.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Budget helmet with no testing approved agencies like ECE and Snell
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, good air flow. Budget helmet with no testing approved agencies like ECE and Snell. Great for a backup helmet. I used it for a motorcycle safety class and worked perfect for that. I would not trust the helmet for high speed riding.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy. It does fit tight while putting it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubbys birthday. He wore it for the first time yesterday and said it's a game changer! No wind noise. Super comfy. It does fit tight while putting it on but once it's on it's great. Super price for this helmet!
customer_reviews.author: swims6

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice. Fingers crossed it will be a great investment ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to ride his scooter. Looks solid. Fits nice. Fingers crossed it will be a great investment to protect him on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, Looks Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and his new motorcycle, fits great, looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: lisa thaxton

customer_reviews.title: nice but sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: Nice size fit right and shipped fast... Haven't tried it on my bike yet but I will update if its anything short of great... And also order a size up I got a large but I have a very small head so a normal person's head would need xl
customer_reviews.author: Jaisean Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable if you wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable if you wear glasses. I have this as a backup helmet or a passenger helmet. You definitely get what you pay for with this helmet. I would't wear this across country.
customer_reviews.author: Varg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice helmet for the money..... I couldn't ask for a better fit.... am very happy thanks
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Watch for sizing!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a large in which my husband wears. It came in a large for kids. Even our 11 year old couldn't wears it. It was very nice, but sizing was way off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to get a half decent helmet to wear while riding a 4 wheeler, this helmet exceeded my expectations. Comfortable, good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Festus

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, inside lining coming undone
customer_reviews.text: Great for and I love that there’s adjustments available for air flow. My only complaint is that after a year and a half of use some of the inside fabric lining is coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: ... in a case no impacts drops or rolls looks like crap now ordering another from somewhere
customer_reviews.text: Paint peeled very quickly I always kept it clean and in a case no impacts drops or rolls looks like crap now ordering another from somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Descent helmet. A little noisey and the shield does not like to stay up while cruising even with a fairing but I didn't expect much for the price. Did it's job well to keep the rain out of the eyes so I could keep rolling.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet low price
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat it for the price fits great and hopefully I never get to test it. Saw a few people who have in the other reveiws and seems sturdy and very nice black finish and venting.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lindquist-jr

customer_reviews.title: But I am comfortable with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Fits as advertised. I haven't been in a accident to tell anyone if it is worth it. But I am comfortable with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: GWS

customer_reviews.title: Sport motorcycle Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, design, fit, air vents and weight of the helmet. I also like the adjustable flip down sun visor in clear or smoked the most.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: The helmet seems to fit fine once on but getting it on is rough on ...
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is well worth it's cheaper price. The only issue I have is that the opening is very small...The helmet seems to fit fine once on but getting it on is rough on the ears! Otherwise pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Brendle

customer_reviews.title: All the vents feel cheap and the ones on the top are really bad. When speeds are in the higher range I ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first helmet and in a way it did its job to keep me legal and feel somewhat safe. All the vents feel cheap and the ones on the top are really bad. When speeds are in the higher range I felt like it was going to blow off my head buy a better helmet and value reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Barely fits my head. I seriously thought it was a youth xl when I first tried putting it on. All of my other helmets are large and I went larger since it was a full face. I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The good - price is great
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a new rider and I just bought this for a safety course I took for 3 days. The good - price is great! Sexy black helmet that is aesthetically nice. The fit is perfect. The bad - wind noise !! I was going like 30 miles an hour tops and the howling was very obvious. You can kind of feel like it's cheaply made.. Kind of rackety. 3 stars primarily because I was annoyed at the wind noise.. But not bad for the price
customer_reviews.author: NutritionJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Was involved in a smalll fender bended and lived
customer_reviews.text: This helmet saved my life, i got hit from behind on as a passenger and went down. i luckily didnt get too much damage but I do have some nics and damage. the only thing that could be sold here was different visors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart quickly due to heat.... I got it and it fit bigger than expected ...but you get what you pay for! Overall I got this as cheap helmet to see if I liked riding lasted for about 1 month....dont suggest for longterm
customer_reviews.author: Ashten Nicole Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Its not a good helmet. After 45 mph. It gets loud. Depending on the wind outside. Runs small. To tight. Would not recommend. A lot of fog on the face mask. Not for me
customer_reviews.author: petname

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, feels great, love the quality for the price. Yes, the glass will fog up if you breath out hot air on a cold day... For the price of this one; crack it, get some fog-x, or buy a non-fog shield.
customer_reviews.author: KC Jones

customer_reviews.title: Made to cheap
customer_reviews.text: Made horribly cheap. I hate it. I felt claustrophobic almost pathetic wen I couldn't get the d rings loose. Didn't come with the extra face shield. Face shield barely came up. Feels unsafe. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Love the padding inside. Got a large in another helmet and this one I got in a large too. Fit well. Nice and snug. So fitment is true. Great price, and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Poore

customer_reviews.title: Great first helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner helmet! This helmet is very affordable and decent quality. For it's price it is a great buy; however, I've ridden my motorcycle on the freeway and the sound it generates is extremely loud. I mean with it's price this is the best bang for its buck, just know that the sound gets much louder than the more expensive helmets.
customer_reviews.author: guang mei

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, however very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, however very noisy. The wind and exhaust. When I go on line rides, 20 miles (+), I wear hearing protection.
customer_reviews.author: David Len McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome budget helmet
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what other reviews are talking about pieces falling off this helmet is very solid and quiet considering the price . I also ordered the smoked visor looks pretty sweet
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: So far ridden with this helmet for about a week. It is very comfortable and it allows a lot of air into the helmet which is awesome. It does have this annoying little whistle but I mean you learn to ignore it. Fits very well, I took a chance with getting the Medium. I normally wear a small, and the medium fits just right. Can't attest with a crash test yet, but if it happens I will be sure to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Bought an xl was really happy to receive it. I wear an xl but this one would even slide over my head and doesn't offer a 2xl. So will return and look for another brand on prime.
customer_reviews.author: rghunter

customer_reviews.title: Full face helmet
customer_reviews.text: Ver nice helmet for the price. A large fit great was a bit snug at first but imagine it will fit great while riding.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Tight to get on.  Too big once inside.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The fit and finish is cheap and helmet fit is much larger than expected. It’s hard to get on but very loose when inside. I wish I had kept the box so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph Perino

customer_reviews.title: I was unhappy with the quality of this helmet. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy with the quality of this helmet. I was trying to find a low-cost helmet, but not give up quality. I found that this did not meet my quality standards, and the fit in the XL size seemed small.
customer_reviews.author: Kori Hougland

customer_reviews.title: true to size and pretty well made
customer_reviews.text: true to size and pretty well made. its my first fullface helmet so i have nothing to compare it to.. the vents are a little clackety at highway speeds, but maybe thats normal. its not a make or break thing. the lens could use some anti-fog on the inside. quite comfy though for a full helmet.
customer_reviews.author: mwarrenh

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the "D" ring strap
customer_reviews.text: ok for backup helmet. Don't like the "D" ring strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I order this helmet based on the previous reviews. The fitment size comes very close to Shoei helmets - perfect for me. The helmet feels light, fits well and I hope I never have to find out how it performs! I recommend the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Chanz

customer_reviews.title: Bought an XL and it fits perfect, very comfortable even with my glasses on I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought an XL and it fits perfect, very comfortable even with my glasses on I haven't tested it while riding yet to see how the wind affects it but if I don't do a second post it's good to go
customer_reviews.author: R.Nicome

customer_reviews.title: For the price its a great helmet. I ride Harleys and with this helmet ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price its a great helmet. I ride Harleys and with this helmet a lot of road noise is gone and the stereo sounds so much better. Its very comfortable, its well worth the price. I would recommend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: dean

customer_reviews.title: Wrong helmet shipped.
customer_reviews.text: I was shipped the totally helmet. Not even the right size, and definitely no full face helmet.
customer_reviews.author: RSGTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: XL was too small for my XXL head
customer_reviews.text: Helmet seemed decent enough. My head is big, not crazy big, but big. I can wear an adjustable hat but barely. The XL was too tight so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Badgermike

customer_reviews.title: helmet
customer_reviews.text: Chin strap doesn't have a snap. You must thread it through pull thru double friction tab. Other than this it fits the requirement and has a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fuel full faced helmet
customer_reviews.text: Probably a discontinued model according to economic price. Ordered large as I have others, but it fits really tight for large, however, it worked out great for cold weather riding.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: I use mine to drive a moped to work, loving it
customer_reviews.author: Chad Buhrandt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Impressive build quality and feel for only $40. While my other helmet is a Shoei ref-1200, this helmet is still very usable and comfortable for my passengers.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly on my 10yr old and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Viti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like this helmet. Perfect fit and not too tight when I wear prescription glasses and sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 13 year old son. Got the Medium size, fits well. He really likes the sliding visor and the vents do a great job of keeping the visor clear of fogging.
customer_reviews.author: DJJJS

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for you're buck
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, well packaged, quality is good and up to safety standards.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality inexpensive helmet. Easy to modify yourself (aka headphones) would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Forge

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought. Nice helmet. No tint but very quiet. Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Ok but falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I used it for two day probably less then 10 hours of using it and it was coming apart of the inside ! The vents on it didn't help much with the heat as well. So it's up to you .
customer_reviews.author: kellie koetter

customer_reviews.title: I still have an ear thanks to this helmet airflow ...
customer_reviews.text: I still have an ear thanks to this helmet airflow port was loose on top but as far as safety is concerned did its job and protected me and my girlfriend in our wreck.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size and feels really good on. My friend couldn't believe I got such a good quality helmet on Amazon for such a great price! I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this one for my son and he has not used it yet. The fit is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid, I couldn't believe the quality and comfort of this helmet. It is very solid and has plenty of internal padding, making for a really good feel.
customer_reviews.author: Rikow

customer_reviews.title: ... weird to use but other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.text: The tab to lift the helmet is a bit weird to use but other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Have Had Better Helmets
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is tighter than others I have bought at same size. The material along the cheeks and forehead is rather abrasive. ya get what ya pays for.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Fits great though.
customer_reviews.text: A bit noisy and the front vent on top front broke the first time I moved it. The other vents are also loose and don't stay in position. Fits great though.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Slade

customer_reviews.title: ... XL because of my giant noggin and it fit pretty good. Still a tad tight but fits snug ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered XL because of my giant noggin and it fit pretty good. Still a tad tight but fits snug without pressure. Made really well and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: For the price of these helmet is alright but it ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these helmet is alright but it tends to catch a lot of bugs through the vent holes and it fogs up too easily
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel L.

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to after my other helmet, which was a 'open face' one. Bugs kept getting up under the mask.
customer_reviews.author: DrakIII

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, but excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price, helmet is good and comfortable and accepted at all races. I have used this at 3 drag races so far.
customer_reviews.author: Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Better then ILM helmets
customer_reviews.text: Fits great I'm a xl and it feels good. I bought a ilm helmet xl and it sucked. Haven't rode with it yet so I'm not sure about the noise everyone's complaining about.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice option for electric bicycles
customer_reviews.text: It's a fairly cheap helmet, but keeps you a good bit warmer in the winter and keeps bugs/wind out of your face. Decent ventilation. Nice option for electric bicycles and such
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Feels and looks like a $200 helmet.saved $30 buying on amazon compared to buying at walmart.would buy again and very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: feather j hinesley

customer_reviews.title: I love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet! I love it so much I bought 3 of them! Nice a warm for winter weather. Protects the face and head flawlessly. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and light. Good coverage without making me claustrophobic. Visor lifts easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got lucky and picked the right size. it is a functional helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Thor Allen

customer_reviews.title: Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is good overall but it’s only been two months and the screw that holds the visor is loose and it’s not a normal screw to screw back it
customer_reviews.author: Jaquans201

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's not the most comfortable helmet, that is, the material inside isn't comfortable, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Wasn't expecting much for $47, but was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this helmet. Appears to be well made but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for the price I flipped over the handlebars on my moped and it 100% protected my head and neck would recomend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Ben mcmahan

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Looks great - Fits great - It is valued for the purpose it serves Cons: - None
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

product_meta.title: Fuel Helmets SH-FF0016 Unisex-Adult Full Face Helmet (Gloss Black, Large)
product_meta.description: Size:LargeThe Fuel SH-FF0016 Helmet features a lightweight thermoplastic shell with UV clear-coated paint with a quick release shield and dual top vents and brow vents for better circulation Removable cheek pads allow for easy cleaning This helmet is DOT approved - meeting Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard (FMVSS) 218
feature_bullets: Duel vented diffuser allows for maximum airflow
Adult helmet with a lightweight thermoplastic shell
Removable cheek pads for easy cleaning
DOT FMVSS N. 218 approved for safety
